channel.title: Getting server online help!
channel.description:
hey guys,
right im having a problem with my client and source with getting it online my friend of myn had a client and source up for sale so i bought it and ive port forwarded correctly and ive got port checker and it said it was open (port 43594 and type UDP) and i selected my no-ip address which is scaperzxscape.no-IP.biz which my friended added in there so when you load up client you have to fill in the scaperzxscape address into the box so which i done while running the correct source and it just kept loading and in the end it said "error connecting" somone please help?
thank you for reading

item.title: Getting server online help!
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

  1. why buy a client & source :s

  2. have you ran it?

  3. The hoster has to be on localhost or 127.0.0.1 and other players have to be on ur no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: Getting server online help!
